entry.title: Among The Stars
entry.summary:
Author: TheDragonSmaug

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,547Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 9

Summary: “Are you listening yet, Clark?” the pilot asked, voice hushed and edged with wickedness.   Clark wasn’t sure if he should answer.   “Oh he’s listening. We’re in a vacuum, he can’t hear anything else.” That was Bruce’s voice, dripping with intent. What was going on?

entry.title: A Bat-Vacay
entry.summary:
Author: Alex_Blanc

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,177Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 22

Summary: The Wayne family rarely, if ever, went on vacation. If Bruce agreed to leave Gotham for more than twelve hours, it was usually because the Justice League had collectively dragged him somewhere “for his own good.” This time, both the Batfamily and the League had conspired against him. It had been Dick’s idea, loudly seconded by Barry, that they all deserved a break on neutral ground—a sunny coastal resort tucked away on a private island.

entry.title: A Needle in a Doll
entry.summary:
Author: dandywarholic

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,911Chapters: 16/16Kudos: 714

Summary: Hal Jordan, on a business trip to Gotham, is pretty sure he met the love of his life. He's gorgeous, he's smart, he's charming. When he thinks he finally has happiness in his grasp, the ring chooses him and sends him to Oa.When Hal gets back, Bruce isn't the same person who he met six months prior. He's moved on, he's hurt, and Hal can't recover it without exposing his identity.Who would guess that in years to come, they'd become coworkers who hate each others guts?

entry.title: Soulmates, secrets, and kisses
entry.summary:
Author: rie_rotisse

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,374Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 433

entry.title: With All Due Respect
entry.summary:
Author: BlueGrapefruitSoda

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,619Chapters: 17/17Kudos: 374

Summary: Bruce gave a slight smile, his voice low and curiosity piqued. “You have permission to speak.” Clark shifted uncomfortably, his gaze dropping to the ground. “As someone who’s dedicated his life to your safety and happiness,” he began, his voice quiet but steady, “it matters deeply to me that you choose a partner truly worthy of you — someone who honors your love and your loyalty.” He drew in a slow breath, then lifted his eyes to meet Bruce’s. “And I’m afraid, my prince… the man you’re considering is not that person.”Or Clark is in love with Bruce, the prince he protects and Bruce is oblivious.
